value.title: Gamers, brace yourselves: AI development could lead to another GPU shortage
value.excerpt: The rise in AI tools and chatbots may be exciting for many, but gamers and enthusiasts could soon be getting cryptomining flashbacks. value.title: Taiwan Semiconductor's Sales Are Down -- Even With the AI Boom
value.excerpt: Investors have bid up computer chip stocks such as TSMC this year on the back of the artificial intelligence (AI) boom, which requires an immense amount of computing power to train and run.
